trans-unit.source: Provides the page adapter class for the WML device adapter set specifically designed for Openwave's UP browser.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe de adaptador de página para o adaptador de dispositivo WML definido especificamente projetado para Openwave navegador.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis, consulte o [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) site da Web.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.UpWmlPageAdapter"></xref> class.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis, consulte o [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) site da Web.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a text writer suitable for the given adapters.
trans-unit.target: Cria e retorna um gravador de texto adequado para os adaptadores de determinado.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis, consulte o [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) site da Web.

trans-unit.source: A text writer suitable for the given adapters.
trans-unit.target: Um gravador de texto adequado para os adaptadores de determinado.

trans-unit.source: Evaluates whether the device adapter set applies to the specified request.
trans-unit.target: Avalia se a configuração de dispositivo do adaptador aplica-se à solicitação especificada.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis, consulte o [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) site da Web.

trans-unit.source: |Class|Returns|Preferred rendering type|Check value of JavaScript property| |-----------|-------------|------------------------------|----------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> property is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.|The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> property returns `true`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> property is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.|The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> property returns `false`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> property is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>.|Not applicable.|
trans-unit.target: | Classe | Retorna | Preferência de tipo de processamento | Verifique o valor da propriedade de JavaScript | |-----------|-------------|------------------------------|----------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>| `true`| Verifica se o valor da propriedade <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>é <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32>ou <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>. | A propriedade retorna <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> `true`. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter>| `true`| Verifica se o valor da propriedade <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>é <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32>ou <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>. | A propriedade retorna <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> `false`. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>| `true`| Verifica se o valor da propriedade <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>é <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11>ou <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>. | Not applicable.|</xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the device adapter set applies to the specified request; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o adaptador de dispositivo definido aplica-se a solicitação especificada; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
